original: @8b # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @8b # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sambuddha bha shi ta pra ti bimba laksha na bi barna n'a ma /
analyzed: sambuddha bha shi ta pra ti bimba laksha na bi barna n'a ma /
translated: SamyaksambuddhabhƒÅ·π£ita-pratimƒÅlaksanaviv·πõti-nƒÅma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam 'grel zhes bya ba //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam 'grel zhes bya ba //
translated: The Explanation of the Characteristics of the Buddha's Image Spoken by the Perfect Buddha, called The Commentary

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩsku gnyis rjes skyes rgyal ba yi //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo // sku gnyis rjes skyes rgyal ba yi //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One!üîΩHaving bowed to the image of the Victorious One

original: sku la phyag 'tshal de nas ni //üîΩbdag gis nges pas mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: sku la phyag 'tshal de nas ni // bdag gis nges pas mtshan nyid de //
translated: Born from the two bodies,üîΩI will now, according to my ability,

original: ji ltar nus bzhin rnam 'grel bri //
analyzed: ji ltar nus bzhin rnam 'grel bri //
translated: Write the characteristics of the image as I have ascertained them.

original: ji ltar bsnyen bkur bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni nye bar spyad pa ste //
analyzed: ji ltar bsnyen bkur bar bgyi zhes bya ba ni nye bar spyad pa ste //
translated: How should one serve? refers to the requisites.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i cha shas kyi mtshan nyid n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng yongs su gab pa zhes bya ba ni n+ya gro dha ni shing ljon pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i cha shas kyi mtshan nyid n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng yongs su gab pa zhes bya ba ni n+ya gro dha ni shing ljon pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One's body is characterized by parts, and is completely covered in width and height like a banyan tree - a banyan tree is a tree.

original: de'i yal ga chu zheng gab pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i yal ga chu zheng gab pa lta bu'o //
translated: Its branches are covered in width and height.

original: 'di 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gsungs so zhes bya ba kha cig go //
analyzed: 'di 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gsungs so zhes bya ba kha cig go //
translated: This is well-known in the circle of light, say some.

original: gzhan la ni 'di sku khyad par la gsungs pa'i phyir na phyag gnyis logs su brkyang ba ni 'dom gang ste /
analyzed: gzhan la ni 'di sku khyad par la gsungs pa'i phyir na phyag gnyis logs su brkyang ba ni 'dom gang ste /
translated: Since it is said to be a special feature of others, the two arms extended separately are one fathom.

original: ji srid sku'i tshad de srid 'dom gyi srid du yang gsungs so //
analyzed: ji srid sku'i tshad de srid 'dom gyi srid du yang gsungs so //
translated: As much as the size of the body, that much is the size of the fathom.

original: ji srid ces pa la sogs pa'i 'jam pa ni snum pa'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: ji srid ces pa la sogs pa'i 'jam pa ni snum pa'i chos nyid do //
translated: Smoothness, etc. is the nature of oiliness.

original: mdzes pa ni yid 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa ni yid 'phrog pa'o //
translated: Beauty is captivating the mind.

original: 'gying bag dang ldan pa ni gsum dgu la sogs pa'i yon tan no //üîΩbdun mtho ba zhes pa ni cha shas bdun stengs su @9a * //
analyzed: 'gying bag dang ldan pa ni gsum dgu la sogs pa'i yon tan no // bdun mtho ba zhes pa ni cha shas bdun stengs su @9a * //
translated: Having grace is the quality of being endowed with the three, nine, etc.

original: mtho ba ste /
analyzed: mtho ba ste /
translated: The seven elevated parts are the seven parts that are elevated.

original: gang las na zhabs gnyis drang phyag gnyis dang mgrin pa zhes so //
analyzed: gang las na zhabs gnyis drang phyag gnyis dang mgrin pa zhes so //

original: de la zhes pa la sogs pas ni srid la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyi tshad gsungs pa bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa la sogs pas ni srid la sogs pa lnga po rnams kyi tshad gsungs pa bshad par bya'o //

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba nus pa nyon cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji ltar 'chad par 'gyur ba nus pa nyon cig ces pa'o //
translated: The one called Bodhisattva, etc. is listen to the ability that will be explained.

original: dbu skra'i gnas dang de gnyis la zhes pa ni dpral ba'i steng dang gtsug gtor 'og la sor mo bzhi'o //
analyzed: dbu skra'i gnas dang de gnyis la zhes pa ni dpral ba'i steng dang gtsug gtor 'og la sor mo bzhi'o //
translated: The two places of the hair and the two places are four fingerbreadths above the forehead and below the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a.

original: gtsug la yang sor mo bzhi'o //
analyzed: gtsug la yang sor mo bzhi'o //

original: de gnyis ni sor mo bzhir gsungs so //
analyzed: de gnyis ni sor mo bzhir gsungs so //

original: sor mo phyed dang bcu gsum zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: sor mo phyed dang bcu gsum zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: Thirteen and a half fingerbreadths is the face mandala.

original: de'i sum cha dpral ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba las so //
analyzed: de'i sum cha dpral ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba las so //
translated: One third of that is the forehead, and so on, by the division.

original: kos ko'i mtha' gang gi de'i kos ko'i mtha' dang // shangs kyi 'og ti mthar thug pa'i gnas la'o //üîΩgos ko'i mtha' ni lhag bcas pa ni sor phyed kyis lhag pa nyid do //
analyzed: kos ko'i mtha' gang gi de'i kos ko'i mtha' dang // shangs kyi 'og ti mthar thug pa'i gnas la'o // gos ko'i mtha' ni lhag bcas pa ni sor phyed kyis lhag pa nyid do //
translated: The end of the cheek is the place that reaches the end of the lower nose.üîΩThe end of the cheek is with remainder, which is just half a fingerbreadth.

original: kos ko la ni sor gnyis ni logs kyi rgya ru ste //
analyzed: kos ko la ni sor gnyis ni logs kyi rgya ru ste //

original: steng gi srid pa yin pa zhes so //
analyzed: steng gi srid pa yin pa zhes so //
translated: It is the height above.

original: sor mo gsum po 'di srid du ste //
analyzed: sor mo gsum po 'di srid du ste //

original: ste cung zad mtho ba zhes khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: ste cung zad mtho ba zhes khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
translated: It is slightly raised, which is the special inclusion.

original: ltag dang bcas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la mthong ngo //
analyzed: ltag dang bcas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la mthong ngo //

original: 'byung sa steng du cha yis zhes pa'i cha'i sgra yis sor mo gsum gyi sum char bshad de //
analyzed: 'byung sa steng du cha yis zhes pa'i cha'i sgra yis sor mo gsum gyi sum char bshad de //
translated: The word ‚Äúpart‚Äù in ‚Äúon the upper part of the body‚Äù means one-third of three fingers.

original: 'byung sa mtho ba 'di'i cha la bim pa'i ri mo zhes te //
analyzed: 'byung sa mtho ba 'di'i cha la bim pa'i ri mo zhes te //
translated: The upper part of the body is called the ‚Äúmark of the bƒ´jap≈´ra.‚Äù

original: bim pa'i 'bras bu'i rnam pa'i ri mo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bim pa'i 'bras bu'i rnam pa'i ri mo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means the mark of the shape of a bƒ´jap≈´ra fruit.

original: zhal gyi grva ni cha gcig ste sor mo gcig go //
analyzed: zhal gyi grva ni cha gcig ste sor mo gcig go //
translated: The corner of the mouth is one part, one finger.

original: ji ltar byung ba ste ji ltar 'khrungs pa bzhin tshems kyi rgyal po la sogs pa rim pas gang ba rnams kyi rnam par bkod pa gsungs pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar byung ba ste ji ltar 'khrungs pa bzhin tshems kyi rgyal po la sogs pa rim pas gang ba rnams kyi rnam par bkod pa gsungs pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: Just as it happened, just as it was born, the arrangement of the king of teeth and so on, which are filled in order, is said to be like that.

original: sor mo'i sum cha zhes pa ni sor mo'i sum cha pad sgros te de bzhin du sna'i rtse mo'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: sor mo'i sum cha zhes pa ni sor mo'i sum cha pad sgros te de bzhin du sna'i rtse mo'i 'og tu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne-third of a finger‚Äù means one-third of a finger is a lotus bud, and likewise below the tip of the nose.

original: mchu'i steng du chu 'bab pa'i rnam pa lta bu'i pad sgros so //
analyzed: mchu'i steng du chu 'bab pa'i rnam pa lta bu'i pad sgros so //

original: sma ra'i gnas kyi dbus su mtshams 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: sma ra'i gnas kyi dbus su mtshams 'dra ba'o //
translated: In the middle of the place of the moustache, it is similar to a boundary.

original: sor mo phyed mnyam pa zhes khyad par gyi bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: sor mo phyed mnyam pa zhes khyad par gyi bsdu ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHalf a finger even‚Äù is a special summary.

original: shangs kyi bu ga zhes pa ni shangs kyi sbubs zlum por 'khyil ba'o //
analyzed: shangs kyi bu ga zhes pa ni shangs kyi sbubs zlum por 'khyil ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúnostril cavity‚Äù is the round cavity of the nose.

original: shangs kyi rgyud dang shangs kyi rtse mo zhal dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: shangs kyi rgyud dang shangs kyi rtse mo zhal dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúnose bridge‚Äù and the ‚Äúnose tip‚Äù are equal to the face.

original: cha phyed ni sor mo phyed do //
analyzed: cha phyed ni sor mo phyed do //
translated: Half a finger is half a finger-width.

original: spyan gyi bar la zhes pa ni spyan dag gi dbus la sor mo ste sor gcig gi tshad do //
analyzed: spyan gyi bar la zhes pa ni spyan dag gi dbus la sor mo ste sor gcig gi tshad do //
translated: ‚ÄúBetween the eyes‚Äù is the middle of the eyes, which is one finger-width.

original: dpral ba'i 'og can gnyis kyi nye ba shangs kyi logs la re re ji srid pa zhes so //
analyzed: dpral ba'i 'og can gnyis kyi nye ba shangs kyi logs la re re ji srid pa zhes so //

original: spyan gyi 'bras bu'i dbus kyi snying po de la sor gnyis kyi lnga chas shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig go //
analyzed: spyan gyi 'bras bu'i dbus kyi snying po de la sor gnyis kyi lnga chas shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig go //
translated: Some say that the center of the eye‚Äôs pupil should be known as one-fifth of two fingers.

original: de bzhin sor gcig gi snga cha la byed do zhes te //
analyzed: de bzhin sor gcig gi snga cha la byed do zhes te //
translated: Others say it is one-fifth of one finger.

original: 'di ni rigs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs @9b so ;üîΩ/ sor gnyis sor gsum dag ces pa ni sor gnyis ni spyan gyi nor bu'i cha'o //üîΩsor gsum ni spyan gyi zur dang nye ba ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rigs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs @9b so ; / sor gnyis sor gsum dag ces pa ni sor gnyis ni spyan gyi nor bu'i cha'o // sor gsum ni spyan gyi zur dang nye ba ste //
translated: This is understood to be the nature of reasoning.üîΩ‚ÄúTwo fingers, three fingers‚Äù means that two fingers are the part of the eye‚Äôs jewel.

original: sha'i zlum dang lhan cig go //
analyzed: sha'i zlum dang lhan cig go //
translated: Three fingers are the corner of the eye and the adjacent flesh.

original: spyan la sor mo bzhi ni rang gi mtshams so //
analyzed: spyan la sor mo bzhi ni rang gi mtshams so //
translated: The four fingers of the eyes are at the sides.

original: rnam par 'byung ba nas spyan gyi dbyibs su gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'byung ba nas spyan gyi dbyibs su gsal ba'o //
translated: From the opening, the shape of the eyes is clear.

original: rtog po ni legs par mtho ba'o //
analyzed: rtog po ni legs par mtho ba'o //
translated: The eyes are well raised.

original: spyan gyi sbubs la sor mo gsum zhes pa ni smin ma'i 'og tu spyan 'bras nas brtsams te /
analyzed: spyan gyi sbubs la sor mo gsum zhes pa ni smin ma'i 'og tu spyan 'bras nas brtsams te /
translated: The three fingers of the eye sockets, beginning from the eyeball, are below the eyebrows.

original: steng dang logs sor mo gsum mo //üîΩspyan gyi zur dang shangs kyi logs dang spyan dag gi bar mnyam du bya'o //
analyzed: steng dang logs sor mo gsum mo // spyan gyi zur dang shangs kyi logs dang spyan dag gi bar mnyam du bya'o //
translated: The upper and lower [parts] are three fingers.üîΩThe corners of the eyes, the sides of the nose, and the space between the eyes should be made equal.

original: kos ko'i zhes pa ni kos ko'i mtha' dang steng du spyan 'bras kyi logs nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: kos ko'i zhes pa ni kos ko'i mtha' dang steng du spyan 'bras kyi logs nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The cheeks are the sides of the eyeballs, definitely connected above and at the edge of the cheeks.

original: de ma yin pa zhal gyi zur gnyis kyang de bzhin bya'o //
analyzed: de ma yin pa zhal gyi zur gnyis kyang de bzhin bya'o //
translated: The two corners of the mouth should also be done in the same way.

original: smin dbus ni smin ma'i bar du sor mo phyed dang gnyis so //
analyzed: smin dbus ni smin ma'i bar du sor mo phyed dang gnyis so //
translated: The middle of the eyebrows is one and a half fingers between the eyebrows.

original: rgyar ni zheng du bya'o //
analyzed: rgyar ni zheng du bya'o //
translated: The width is the width.

original: dbus su zhes pa ni smin ma'i dbus mdzod spur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su zhes pa ni smin ma'i dbus mdzod spur shes par bya'o //
translated: The middle is the middle of the eyebrows, to be known as the ≈´r·πáƒÅ.

original: zla ba gang zhig mdzes pa ltar //
analyzed: zla ba gang zhig mdzes pa ltar //
translated: Like a beautiful moon,

original: shangs kyi rgyud dang mdzod spu'i thig / de bzhin gtsug tor dbyibs legs pa //
analyzed: shangs kyi rgyud dang mdzod spu'i thig / de bzhin gtsug tor dbyibs legs pa //
translated: The bridge of the nose, the line of the ≈´r·πáƒÅ, and the shape of the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a,

original: gtsug gi nor bu de shes bya //
analyzed: gtsug gi nor bu de shes bya //
translated: and the crest-jewel are to be known.

original: zhes pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'di dkyil gyi rnam pa'o //üîΩgtsug tor yang de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'di dkyil gyi rnam pa'o // gtsug tor yang de bzhin du'o //
translated: The crest-jewel is the shape of a ma·πá·∏çala.üîΩThe u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a is like that.

original: snyan gyi rtser yang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: snyan gyi rtser yang zhes bya'o //
translated: The tip of the ear is also like that.

original: bu ga'i steng du snyan ni sor mo bzhi'o //
analyzed: bu ga'i steng du snyan ni sor mo bzhi'o //
translated: The ear is four finger-breadths above the opening.

original: zheng du ni rgya ru ste 'dab ma'i zheng cha gcig go zhes so //
analyzed: zheng du ni rgya ru ste 'dab ma'i zheng cha gcig go zhes so //
translated: The width is the diameter, and the width of the leaf is one part.

original: snyan gyi rtse mo dag sor mo phyed kyi tshad ni 'dab mar brjod do //
analyzed: snyan gyi rtse mo dag sor mo phyed kyi tshad ni 'dab mar brjod do //
translated: The tip of the ear is half a finger-breadth in size, and is said to be the leaf.üîΩThe height is one finger-breadth.

original: steng mtho zhes pa ni sor mo gcig / snyan gyi sbubs ni phyed cha ste //
analyzed: steng mtho zhes pa ni sor mo gcig / snyan gyi sbubs ni phyed cha ste //
translated: The cavity of the ear is half a part.

original: sor phyed snyan gyi khung du 'jug pa la'o //
analyzed: sor phyed snyan gyi khung du 'jug pa la'o //
translated: Half a finger is inserted into the ear-hole.

original: 'gram pa nas snyan ngag gi dbus me tog kha ma bye ba'i rnam par steng du 'khyil ba'o //
analyzed: 'gram pa nas snyan ngag gi dbus me tog kha ma bye ba'i rnam par steng du 'khyil ba'o //
translated: From the cheek to the middle of the ear, it is coiled upward in the shape of an unopened flower.

original: sor phyed dang gsum gyis snyan du 'gyur te /
analyzed: sor phyed dang gsum gyis snyan du 'gyur te /
translated: The ear is three and a half fingers.

original: 'dab ma dang lhan cig phyed dang bcas pa'i sor mo gnyis te /
analyzed: 'dab ma dang lhan cig phyed dang bcas pa'i sor mo gnyis te /
translated: Two fingers together with the petals.

original: nang gi cha zhes pa ni zheng du shar dang nub kyi mtha'o //
analyzed: nang gi cha zhes pa ni zheng du shar dang nub kyi mtha'o //
translated: The inner part means the east and west ends in width.

original: snyan gyi logs kyi 'dab ma la'o //
analyzed: snyan gyi logs kyi 'dab ma la'o //
translated: On the side of the ear, on the petals.

original: spyan mtha' las mtha' sor mo phyed dang lnga snyan kyi 'dab ma ste /
analyzed: spyan mtha' las mtha' sor mo phyed dang lnga snyan kyi 'dab ma ste /
translated: From the edge of the eye, five and a half fingers to the edge of the ear, the petals of the ear.

original: snyan gyi 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: snyan gyi 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with the petals of the ear.

original: snyan nas brtsams te snyan gyi bar bdun gyi cha'i dbu la sor bco brgyad do //
analyzed: snyan nas brtsams te snyan gyi bar bdun gyi cha'i dbu la sor bco brgyad do //
translated: From the ear, starting from the ear, on the head, eighteen fingers.

original: rgyab du sor mo bcu bzhi ste //
analyzed: rgyab du sor mo bcu bzhi ste //
translated: In the back, fourteen fingers.

original: nub kyi cha'i dbu la'o //
analyzed: nub kyi cha'i dbu la'o //
translated: On the head of the west part.

original: de dag bar du ni nub kyi cha'i khyad par dang ngo //
analyzed: de dag bar du ni nub kyi cha'i khyad par dang ngo //
translated: Those are the distinctions of the west part in between.

original: sor mo sum cu rtsa gnyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni gcig tu bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: sor mo sum cu rtsa gnyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni gcig tu bya bar gsungs so //
translated: Thirty-two fingers, and so on, is said to be done as one.

original: zlum po ni bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zlum po ni bskor ba'o //
translated: Round means circular.

original: mgul ni cha bzhi ste sor bzhi'o //
analyzed: mgul ni cha bzhi ste sor bzhi'o //
translated: The neck is four parts, four fingers.

original: mgul nas brtsams te snyan la steng du sor mo dgu'o //
analyzed: mgul nas brtsams te snyan la steng du sor mo dgu'o //
translated: From the neck, starting from the neck, to the ear, nine fingers above.

original: shar dang nub kyi cha la bskor ba'i phyir sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi mgul la'o //
analyzed: shar dang nub kyi cha la bskor ba'i phyir sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi mgul la'o //
translated: Because it is turned to the east and west, it is twenty-four fingerbreadths around the neck.

original: mgul ba las @10a * //üîΩmgul ba'i lhag ma la sor mo brgyad de //
analyzed: mgul ba las @10a * // mgul ba'i lhag ma la sor mo brgyad de //
translated: From the necküîΩto the navel is twenty-four fingerbreadths.

original: logs su snyan gyi nye bar sor bzhi 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: logs su snyan gyi nye bar sor bzhi 'dzin pas so //
translated: The sides are four fingerbreadths long, as far as the ears.

original: thal gong sor mo bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: thal gong sor mo bcu gnyis so //
translated: The shoulders are twelve fingerbreadths.

original: snying ga'i bar zhes pa ni snying ga'i nye ba'i bar gyi cha shas nyid dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: snying ga'i bar zhes pa ni snying ga'i nye ba'i bar gyi cha shas nyid dang bral ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Up to the heart means that the part up to the heart is free from the navel.

original: gdong pa bzhi yi tshad kyis ni //üîΩphyag gi srid du zhes te ring du'o //
analyzed: gdong pa bzhi yi tshad kyis ni // phyag gi srid du zhes te ring du'o //
translated: The face is four fingerbreadths.üîΩThe length of the arm is the length of the face.

original: phyag gi srid ces pa ni 'dir phrag pa nas brtsams te phyag gi rtse mo ji srid pa phyag tu gsungs so //
analyzed: phyag gi srid ces pa ni 'dir phrag pa nas brtsams te phyag gi rtse mo ji srid pa phyag tu gsungs so //
translated: The length of the arm is said to be from the shoulder to the tip of the fingers.

original: 'dir phrag pa nas gru mo'i steng yan chod sor mo nyi shu dpung pa la blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir phrag pa nas gru mo'i steng yan chod sor mo nyi shu dpung pa la blta bar bya'o //
translated: Here, from the shoulder to the elbow is twenty fingerbreadths, which is the upper arm.

original: gru mo'i 'og nas sku mkhrig ma yan chod phyag ngar te sor mo bcu drug go //
analyzed: gru mo'i 'og nas sku mkhrig ma yan chod phyag ngar te sor mo bcu drug go //
translated: From below the elbow to the wrist is the forearm, sixteen fingerbreadths.

original: mkhrig ma'i 'og nas phyag gi rtse mo yan chad gru mo'i zur gyi bar phyag ngar du blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mkhrig ma'i 'og nas phyag gi rtse mo yan chad gru mo'i zur gyi bar phyag ngar du blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: From the underside of the wrist to the tip of the finger, the forearm is the distance from the tip of the thumb to the elbow.

original: mchan 'og nas brtsams te bar lhu'i cha dang po'i tshigs kyi mtha' yongs su blta ba ni sor mo nyi shu'o //
analyzed: mchan 'og nas brtsams te bar lhu'i cha dang po'i tshigs kyi mtha' yongs su blta ba ni sor mo nyi shu'o //
translated: From the armpit to the end of the first joint of the fingers is twenty finger-widths.

original: phrag pa'i mdun gyi mtha' nas brtsams te rgyab tu gsungs pa ni 'di gnyis mnyam du bcu gnyis kyi tshigs so zhes so //
analyzed: phrag pa'i mdun gyi mtha' nas brtsams te rgyab tu gsungs pa ni 'di gnyis mnyam du bcu gnyis kyi tshigs so zhes so //
translated: From the front of the shoulder to the back is twelve finger-widths.

original: tshigs kyi phyogs zlum po la sor mo bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: tshigs kyi phyogs zlum po la sor mo bcu gnyis so //
translated: The round part of the joint is twelve finger-widths.

original: phyag dag gi phyag gi srid du sor mo bdun gyi tshad do //
analyzed: phyag dag gi phyag gi srid du sor mo bdun gyi tshad do //
translated: The length of the hand is seven finger-widths.

original: phyag gi mthil la dbus su rgyar sor lnga'i tshad /
analyzed: phyag gi mthil la dbus su rgyar sor lnga'i tshad /
translated: In the middle of the palm of the hand is five finger-widths.

original: grangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la mtshan rnams gsungs pa ni mtshan thams cad pa ste //
analyzed: grangs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la mtshan rnams gsungs pa ni mtshan thams cad pa ste //
translated: The Blessed One's hands have all the marks.

original: 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa la sogs pas lhan cig pa'i gzugs zhes pa ni mtshan thams cad kyi gzugs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa la sogs pas lhan cig pa'i gzugs zhes pa ni mtshan thams cad kyi gzugs so //
translated: The form of the wheel with a thousand spokes and so on is the form of all the characteristics.

original: gang yang ji lta ba'i ri mo'i rnam pa dang / gang yang bkra shis kyi rnam pa dang / gang yang rig pa'i rnam pa dang / gang yang sa'i rnam pa dang / gang yang g-yung drung 'khyil ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang ji lta ba'i ri mo'i rnam pa dang / gang yang bkra shis kyi rnam pa dang / gang yang rig pa'i rnam pa dang / gang yang sa'i rnam pa dang / gang yang g-yung drung 'khyil ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Also, the form of the auspicious mark, the form of the knowledge, the form of the earth, the form of the coiled swastika, and so on.

original: shis pa'i yon tan med pa dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: shis pa'i yon tan med pa dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: It is not without the qualities of auspiciousness.

original: kun gyi mtshan gyi gzugs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kun gyi mtshan gyi gzugs su gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the form of all the characteristics.

original: rnam pa phan tshun so sor ma 'byar ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa phan tshun so sor ma 'byar ba'o //
translated: The forms are not mixed up with each other.

original: phyag sor gung mo sor lnga'i srid du ring ba'o //üîΩgung mo las tshigs phyed kyis dman pa mdzub mo ste sdigs mdzub bo //
analyzed: phyag sor gung mo sor lnga'i srid du ring ba'o // gung mo las tshigs phyed kyis dman pa mdzub mo ste sdigs mdzub bo //
translated: The middle finger is five finger-widths long.üîΩThe index finger is half a joint shorter than the middle finger, the threatening one.

original: sor mo phyed kyis dman pa ni ming med do //
analyzed: sor mo phyed kyis dman pa ni ming med do //
translated: The ring finger is half a finger shorter.

original: mtheb chung ni nye ba ste ming med las zhes te //
analyzed: mtheb chung ni nye ba ste ming med las zhes te //
translated: The little finger is close to the ring finger.

original: ming med las tshigs gcig gis dman pa ni mtheb chung ngo //
analyzed: ming med las tshigs gcig gis dman pa ni mtheb chung ngo //
translated: The ring finger is one joint shorter than the nameless finger.

original: de rnams tshigs phyed sen mos mdzes pa ni yid 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams tshigs phyed sen mos mdzes pa ni yid 'phrog pa'o //
translated: The fingers are beautified by half a joint of nail.

original: mkhrig ma'i steng /
analyzed: mkhrig ma'i steng /
translated: On the upper arm.

original: 'dir don gyis go bar bya ba'i phyir mtheb chung spangs nas bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'dir don gyis go bar bya ba'i phyir mtheb chung spangs nas bzhi'o //
translated: Here, for the sake of understanding the meaning, the ring finger is excluded, and there are four.

original: lte ba yang de bzhin du de srid sor mo bzhi pa nyid do //
analyzed: lte ba yang de bzhin du de srid sor mo bzhi pa nyid do //
translated: The navel is also of that size, four fingerbreadths.

original: mtheb chen tshigs gnyis so //
analyzed: mtheb chen tshigs gnyis so //
translated: The thumb has two joints.

original: tshigs phyed du sen @10b mo'o //
analyzed: tshigs phyed du sen @10b mo'o //
translated: Half a joint is the nail.

original: mtheb chen gyi rtsa ba dang / mdzub mo'i rtsa ba'i bar la sor mo gsum mo //
analyzed: mtheb chen gyi rtsa ba dang / mdzub mo'i rtsa ba'i bar la sor mo gsum mo //
translated: Between the base of the thumb and the base of the index finger is three fingerbreadths.

original: mtheb chung dang mkhrig ma dag gi dbus kyi cha phyag gi cha la srid du ste ring du sor mo lnga'o //
analyzed: mtheb chung dang mkhrig ma dag gi dbus kyi cha phyag gi cha la srid du ste ring du sor mo lnga'o //
translated: In the middle of the ring finger and the wrist, in the part of the hand, it is five fingerbreadths long.

original: 'dir don gyis go bar bya ba'i phyir mtheb chung spangs nas phyag gnyis kyi dbus ma'i nye bar ring du tshigs gsum gyi cha yis mtho ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir don gyis go bar bya ba'i phyir mtheb chung spangs nas phyag gnyis kyi dbus ma'i nye bar ring du tshigs gsum gyi cha yis mtho ba'o //
translated: Here, for the sake of understanding the meaning, the ring finger is excluded. The middle of the two hands is three fingerbreadths high.

original: de steng zhes pa ni mchan 'og gi steng du phrag pa'i mtshams su cha dgur bya'o //
analyzed: de steng zhes pa ni mchan 'og gi steng du phrag pa'i mtshams su cha dgur bya'o //
translated: The word above means that above the armpits, at the level of the shoulders, there are nine parts.

original: sor mo dgu po rnams kyi tshad do //
analyzed: sor mo dgu po rnams kyi tshad do //
translated: This is the measure of the nine fingers.

original: brang dang sku rgyab ces pa ni sku brang dang sku rgyab dag re re nyid la bskor ba ste yongs su zlum du sor mo lnga bcu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: brang dang sku rgyab ces pa ni sku brang dang sku rgyab dag re re nyid la bskor ba ste yongs su zlum du sor mo lnga bcu rtsa drug go //
translated: The words chest and back mean that the chest and the back are each completely round, with fifty-six fingers.

original: nu ma lte ba'i bar de bzhin zhes pa ni nu ma dang lte ba'i bar la sor mo bcu drug go //
analyzed: nu ma lte ba'i bar de bzhin zhes pa ni nu ma dang lte ba'i bar la sor mo bcu drug go //
translated: The words from the nipple to the navel mean that the distance from the nipple to the navel is sixteen fingers.üîΩThe words the navel and the two sides mean that the two sides of the navel are one finger.

original: kun 'bigs zhes pa ste khung dang / tshigs dag ces pa ste tshigs kyi mdud pa dag dang / lte ba gnyis kyi cha shas pa gas pa 'dus pa de dag lhan cig lte ba'i khung ni sor mo gcig go //
analyzed: kun 'bigs zhes pa ste khung dang / tshigs dag ces pa ste tshigs kyi mdud pa dag dang / lte ba gnyis kyi cha shas pa gas pa 'dus pa de dag lhan cig lte ba'i khung ni sor mo gcig go //
translated: The words the two sides of the navel mean that the two sides of the navel are one finger.

original: lte ba'i dbus su yongs su brtag pa ni lte ba nas brtsams te rgyab dang lhan cig ji srid lte ba tshun chad zlum po la sor mo bzhi bcu rtsa drug go / srid kyi rgya ru zlum po dag la pags pa'i 'og tu sor mo bzhi 'chad
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su yongs su brtag pa ni lte ba nas brtsams te rgyab dang lhan cig ji srid lte ba tshun chad zlum po la sor mo bzhi bcu rtsa drug go / srid kyi rgya ru zlum po dag la pags pa'i 'og tu sor mo bzhi 'chad
translated: The width of the body is round for four finger-widths under the skin.

original: pa'o // sgang gnyis kyi steng du sor gcig go / brla zhes pa ni brla'i steng du mnyam gzhag yang dag pa'i gzugs bya'o //
analyzed: pa'o // sgang gnyis kyi steng du sor gcig go / brla zhes pa ni brla'i steng du mnyam gzhag yang dag pa'i gzugs bya'o //
translated: The thighs are to be made equal to the upper arms, with one finger-width above.

original: de dag steng gi dbus kyi bar la sor bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de dag steng gi dbus kyi bar la sor bcu gnyis so //
translated: The distance between the two thighs is twelve finger-widths.

original: brla'i rtsa ba'i zlum la sor mo sum cu rtsa drug go / brla'i 'og gi dbus kyi zlum po la sor mo sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: brla'i rtsa ba'i zlum la sor mo sum cu rtsa drug go / brla'i 'og gi dbus kyi zlum po la sor mo sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The roundness at the base of the thighs is thirty-six finger-widths. The roundness at the base of the calves is thirty-two finger-widths.

original: pus mo zhes pa ni pus mo'i rtsar yongs su bskor ba'i zlum la sor mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: pus mo zhes pa ni pus mo'i rtsar yongs su bskor ba'i zlum la sor mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: The knees are to be made twenty-eight finger-widths in circumference at the knee-caps.

original: tshigs bcings pa sngon ma gnyis sor mo bzhi'o //
analyzed: tshigs bcings pa sngon ma gnyis sor mo bzhi'o //
translated: The two previous joints are four finger-widths.

original: pus mo 'og tu pus mo las sor mo ste long bu sor mo gnyis so //
analyzed: pus mo 'og tu pus mo las sor mo ste long bu sor mo gnyis so //
translated: The knee is two finger-widths below the ankle.

original: long bu mi mngon pa la sogs pa ni sor mo'i tshigs gnyis ni mngon pa dang / sha yis 'khyil ba'o //
analyzed: long bu mi mngon pa la sogs pa ni sor mo'i tshigs gnyis ni mngon pa dang / sha yis 'khyil ba'o //
translated: The ankle is not visible, etc. The two joints of the fingers are visible, and are covered with flesh.

original: de'i phyir rtsa ni gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtsa ni gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the veins are located there.

original: rje ngar dag ni dbus kyi 'khyil pa sor mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis yongs su zlum po nyid do //
analyzed: rje ngar dag ni dbus kyi 'khyil pa sor mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis yongs su zlum po nyid do //
translated: The shanks are twenty-one finger-widths in circumference in the middle.

original: dbus kyi 'og tu sor mo bcu bzhis yongs su zlum pa'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi 'og tu sor mo bcu bzhis yongs su zlum pa'o //
translated: The middle is fourteen finger-widths in circumference below.

original: long bu'i 'og tu zhes pa ni zhabs kyi long bu man chod la sor bzhi'o //
analyzed: long bu'i 'og tu zhes pa ni zhabs kyi long bu man chod la sor bzhi'o //
translated: The ankle is four finger-widths below the ankle.

original: long bu'i phyi rol nas ji srid sen mo'i bar du zhabs kyi srid du sor bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: long bu'i phyi rol nas ji srid sen mo'i bar du zhabs kyi srid du sor bcu gnyis so //
translated: From the outside of the ankle up to the nail, the length of the foot is twelve finger-widths.

original: zhabs kyi phyed kyi zheng du 'o zhes pa ni sor mo drug go //üîΩsteng dang 'og gi rgyar sor mo gnyis so //
analyzed: zhabs kyi phyed kyi zheng du 'o zhes pa ni sor mo drug go // steng dang 'og gi rgyar sor mo gnyis so //
translated: The width of the foot is half of that, which is six finger-widths.üîΩThe width above and below is two finger-widths.

original: zhabs gnyis kyi logs zhabs kyi long bu'i 'og rting pa la steng dang 'og tu sor @11a * //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis kyi logs zhabs kyi long bu'i 'og rting pa la steng dang 'og tu sor @11a * //
translated: The sides of the two feet are from below the ankle of the foot up to the heel, above and below.

original: bzhi 'o ; / sor mo drug gi rgya las ni zhes pa la sogs pas ni rgya ste /
analyzed: bzhi 'o ; / sor mo drug gi rgya las ni zhes pa la sogs pas ni rgya ste /
translated: The seal of six fingers, etc.

original: 'phred la sum 'gyur gyis zlum po ste zhes pa ni rting ba'i zur gcig nas gcig gi rting bar du zhabs dang lhan cig du zlum po la sum 'gyur ni sor mo bco brgyad ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'phred la sum 'gyur gyis zlum po ste zhes pa ni rting ba'i zur gcig nas gcig gi rting bar du zhabs dang lhan cig du zlum po la sum 'gyur ni sor mo bco brgyad ces pa'i don to //
translated: The width is three times the circumference, i.e., from the heel to the heel, together with the sole, is three times the circumference, which means eighteen fingers.

original: zhabs kyi sor mo lnga po rnams ni tshigs gnyis pa rtse mo'i phyed du sen mos mdzes pa ni mtheb chen no //
analyzed: zhabs kyi sor mo lnga po rnams ni tshigs gnyis pa rtse mo'i phyed du sen mos mdzes pa ni mtheb chen no //
translated: The five toes of the foot are two joints, with the tip half a finger.

original: sor mo lnga po rnams ni yongs su zlum pa'o //
analyzed: sor mo lnga po rnams ni yongs su zlum pa'o //
translated: The five toes are completely round.

original: srid du sor mo gsum zhes pa ni ring du sor mo gsum mo //
analyzed: srid du sor mo gsum zhes pa ni ring du sor mo gsum mo //
translated: The length is three fingers, i.e., three fingers long.

original: zhabs kyi mdzub mo ni srid du mtheb chen dang mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhabs kyi mdzub mo ni srid du mtheb chen dang mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The toes of the foot are the same length as the big toe.

original: de'i phyir mtheb chen gyi srid du 'dzub mo'o //üîΩcha bcu drug gi dbus ma dman zhing thung ba'o ;
analyzed: de'i phyir mtheb chen gyi srid du 'dzub mo'o // cha bcu drug gi dbus ma dman zhing thung ba'o ;
translated: Therefore, the length of the big toe is one finger.üîΩThe middle of the sixteen parts is less and shorter.

original: / gung mo las brgyad chas dman pa ni ming med do //
analyzed: / gung mo las brgyad chas dman pa ni ming med do //
translated: Eight parts less than the middle finger is the little finger.

original: ming med las brgyad chas dman pa ni mtheb chung ngo //
analyzed: ming med las brgyad chas dman pa ni mtheb chung ngo //
translated: The little finger is eight parts less than the nameless finger.

original: sor mo rnams ni sor gcig gi dpangs su'o //üîΩmtheb chen ni phyed dang bcas pa'i sor mo'i dpangs su'o //
analyzed: sor mo rnams ni sor gcig gi dpangs su'o // mtheb chen ni phyed dang bcas pa'i sor mo'i dpangs su'o //
translated: The fingers are one finger-width in height.üîΩThe thumb is one and a half finger-widths in height.

original: zhabs kyi phyed rgyab rus sbal gyi rgyab lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhabs kyi phyed rgyab rus sbal gyi rgyab lta bu'o //
translated: The back of the foot is half the length of the foot, like the back of a tortoise.

original: zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'o //
translated: The soles of the feet are adorned with wheels and so forth.

original: mnyam du 'brel pa ni ngang pa'i rkang pa ltar ma chad par 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam du 'brel pa ni ngang pa'i rkang pa ltar ma chad par 'brel pa'o //
translated: The feet are connected evenly, like the legs of a goose, without a break.

original: bya'i sgo nga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhal rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs so //
analyzed: bya'i sgo nga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhal rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs so //
translated: The face is of four kinds, as stated by the words ‚Äúthe face is like a bird‚Äôs egg,‚Äù and so forth.

original: skyes bu chen po'i zhal ni bya'i sgo nga'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i zhal ni bya'i sgo nga'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The face of a great man is the shape of a bird‚Äôs egg.

original: mandal gyi rnam pa'o ni khro bo rnams kyi yin no //
analyzed: mandal gyi rnam pa'o ni khro bo rnams kyi yin no //
translated: The face of the wrathful ones is the shape of a ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gru bzhi pa yang ngo //
analyzed: gru bzhi pa yang ngo //
translated: It is also square.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab tu zhi bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab tu zhi bar bya'o //
translated: The faces of the perfect buddhas are very peaceful.

original: spyan ni dangs par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: spyan ni dangs par gyur pa ste /
translated: The eyes are clear.

original: thams cad la gzigs par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan no //
analyzed: thams cad la gzigs par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan no //
translated: The eyes that see everything are the eyes of omniscience.

original: steng du lta bar byed pa dang / dman pa la brten pa dang / 'og tu lta ba yang ma yin par ro //
analyzed: steng du lta bar byed pa dang / dman pa la brten pa dang / 'og tu lta ba yang ma yin par ro //
translated: Not looking up, not looking down, not looking to the side, not looking at the inferior, not looking at the superior.

original: bdag gis rnam 'grel 'di byas bsod nams des //
analyzed: bdag gis rnam 'grel 'di byas bsod nams des //
translated: By the merit of composing this commentary,

original: sangs rgyas la sogs tshad ni rdzogs byas te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs tshad ni rdzogs byas te //
translated: May I complete the measure of the Buddha and so forth,

original: rnam par mi rtog byang chub tshogs thob cing //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog byang chub tshogs thob cing //
translated: Attain the accumulation of non-conceptual awakening,üîΩAnd may all beings attain victory.

original: skye dgu rnams kyis rgyal ba nyid thob shog / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam 'grel rdzogs so /
analyzed: skye dgu rnams kyis rgyal ba nyid thob shog / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyi tshad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam 'grel rdzogs so /
translated: The commentary on the characteristics of the measurements of the images taught by the perfect Buddha is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma dha ra dang / lo ts'a ba yar klungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul gung thang gi rgyal sar bsgyur ba'o //üîΩgrub pa kun mkhyen chos rgyal gyi //
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma dha ra dang / lo ts'a ba yar klungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul gung thang gi rgyal sar bsgyur ba'o // grub pa kun mkhyen chos rgyal gyi //
translated: It was translated by the Indian preceptor Dharma Dhara and the Tibetan translator Yarl√∫ngpa Drakpa Gyaltsen at the capital of Mang Yul Gungthang.

original: gsung gi 'od zer snang ba brten //
analyzed: gsung gi 'od zer snang ba brten //
translated: Relying on the light rays of speechüîΩOf the omniscient Dharma King,

original: mkhas chen bho ta pandi ta //
analyzed: mkhas chen bho ta pandi ta //
translated: The great scholar BhotƒÅ Pa·πá·∏çita,

original: dam chos 'dzin dag gsung brten nas //
analyzed: dam chos 'dzin dag gsung brten nas //
translated: Relying on the speech of those who uphold the true Dharma,

original: yar klungs grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis //
analyzed: yar klungs grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis //
translated: Yarlha Shampo, the king of the gods,üîΩand Dragpa Gyaltsen of Yarlung

original: gung thang rgyal sar legs par bsgyur//
analyzed: gung thang rgyal sar legs par bsgyur//
translated: transformed the kingdom of Gungthang into a pure land.
